root.static-content:
In the Kaleo Forms portlet:

  1. Click on "Processes" tab
  2. Click "Add"
  3. Put "Test" in the Name field
  4. For Entry Definition select any (i.e. - "Ticket Definition")
  5. For Workflow select any (i.e. - "Ticket Process")
  6. Select (click) the Workflow that you just selected and the Kaleo Designer UI will pop up.
